alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 8:14PM EDT until June 01 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR PULASKI...CENTRAL ALEXANDER...CENTRAL CARLISLE...BALLARD AND NORTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI COUNTIES... At 713 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tamms to near Wyatt, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported downed trees near Miner around 7 PM. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wickliffe, Bardwell and Karnak. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 17. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 11 and 21. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
